mapper.html:
Hello, this is Romi from Dad's Printing. I just wanted to personally let you know that your order has been shipped and is en route to you as we speak!

The tracking number for your order is: {{7.mappable_column_values.text654}} and it was sent via {{7.mappable_column_values.dropdown0.text}}. It was sent to the address with postal code {{7.mappable_column_values.text71}} and should be arriving with you shortly. 

Your order can be tracked via the mail carrier's websites, let me know if you aren't able to find them and I can provide you with a link. 

Thanks again, we appreciate the business, and please let us know what you think
mapper.subject: Your Order has shipped! Billing & Tracking Enclosed
